snippet: Al Qaeda had announced the death of the Algerian jihadist Mokhtar Belmokhtar, one of the most wanted extremists in North Africa.
abstract: Algerian news media reports that Al Qaeda has announced death of Algerian jihadist Mokhtar Belmokhtar; death of highly sought extremist has been reported multiple times in past.
lead_paragraph: Al Qaeda had announced the death of the Algerian jihadist Mokhtar Belmokhtar, one of the most wanted extremists in North Africa.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Algeria: Al Qaeda Announces Jihadist’s Death
headline.main: Tunisia: Al Qaeda Announces Jihadist’s Death
